content.raw:
bullet versions in Ubuntu repos:

```
 bullet | 2.81-rev2613+dfsg2-1 | trusty/universe | source
 bullet | 2.83.6+dfsg-3        | xenial/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | bionic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-2          | cosmic/universe | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | disco/universe  | source
 bullet | 2.87+dfsg-3          | eoan/universe   | source
```

same for Debian. Is the 2.88 version required for some particular reason or can we relax the requirement here?
